author: Joe Coscarelli, Melena Ryzik and Ben Sisario
description: Billy McFarland wanted to create a luxurious music getaway in the Bahamas. It turned into a washout, with lawsuits and a federal investigation.
title: In Wreckage of the Fyre Festival, Fury, Lawsuits and an Inquiry

author: By Katie French For Mailonline
description: Thermometers are tipped to reach the low 30Cs by the weekend as Britain turns hotter the Bahamas. Pictured: The dramatic sunrise in Tynemouth, Tyne and Wear this morning.
title: Britain to bake in the HOTTEST May temperatures on record
